entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Sainte-Agathe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Jovite 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -10.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: SW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
